It is evident that a good intention brings about the achievement 01 3 good work, and that good work earns the soul's salvation. For if it is good to intend well, it is still better to accomplish 3 good work which has been planned. Therefore the best thing one can do is to provide for the salvation of his soul by a worthy action. Let each one then plan good deeds, which by still more worthy ac- tion he will fulfil, so that he shall at length receive the never end- ing reward which he has earned.
